title: Bonus 25: The Mysterious Q Source
itunes:title: Bonus: The Mysterious Q Source
description: The three synoptic gospels are markedly different from John. It is clear that both Matthew and Luke used Mark. But Matthew and Luke have much material in common. Most scholars think they have a common source, the mysterious "Q". Others think one evangelist copied the other. Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I tackle the issue.
content:encoded: The three synoptic gospels are markedly different from John. It is clear that both Matthew and Luke used Mark. But Matthew and Luke have much material in common. Most scholars think they have a common source, the mysterious "Q". Others think one evangelist copied the other. Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I tackle the issue.
itunes:subtitle: This is a bonus episode for season two. Steve Guerra and I tackle the mysterious Q source
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
